title: Maari Anandhi Song Lyrics (Vaanam Pozhiyaama)
stanzas:
vanam pozhiyama
boomi velaiyuma kooru
pookkal malarndhaalum
soodum azhagilthan peru

enthan uyire naan unna
paathukuren
pattu thuniyaa
poaththikkiren

enna methuvaa aalaiye
maaththikitten
konjam kadhal
keedhalaam koottikitten.

joraa nada potu vadaa
ennoda veeraa
hey hey pair-a
autola polam
ennoda meera.

hey hey hey
kattilum raagam
paaduthadi.
saanjathum thookkam
modhuthadi.

nimmadhi unnaal
vanthathadi.
thaedalum thaanaai
ponathadi.

nenjile unna
naan sumappen.
niththamum vinnil
naan parappen.

boomiye enna
suththuthaiyaa
kangalum thaanaai
sokkuthaiyaa

vidhiyai sari seiyya
thaedi vandha
dhevathaiye
pudhithaai piranthene
nandri solla
vaarthai illa.

ullam uruguthu rasathi
ullavarai ellaam
neethaandi.

vanam pozhiyama
boomi velaiyuma kooru
pookkal malarndhaalum
soodum azhagilthan peru

enthan azhage nee
enthan singakutti
yaarum urasaa
thangakatti

indha morattu payakitta
enna kanda
vandhu vasama enkitta
maattikitta

seo.title: Maari Anandhi Song Lyrics (Vaanam Pozhiyaama)
seo.description: Maari Anandhi Song Lyrics (Vaanam Pozhiyaama) - Tamil song lyrics
